title: Physics-based extraction of material parameters from perovskite experiments via Bayesian optimization
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00911H, Paper
Hualin Zhan, Viqar Ahmad, Azul Mayon, Grace Dansoa Tabi, Anh Dinh Bui, Zhuofeng Li, Daniel Walter, Hieu Nguyen, Klaus Weber, Thomas White, Kylie Catchpole
We present a materials analysis platform that extracts fundamental material parameters from experimental data via interpretable machine learning. This platform is adaptable to other materials/experiments and is implementable on desktop computers.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
